Posts.Content: Dlrsrkr wrote: I recently has a lumpectomy and the biopsy revealed that i had three types of cancers in the lump they took out (IDC, DC in situ and papillary- my needle biopsy just initially revealed IDC). My lymph nodes are clear and my prognosis is Stage 1A. Has anyone ever had 3 types of cancer in one breast? If yes, what was the treatment path that you followed? Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: 3 types of cancer in one breast Dlrsrkr beauz
